  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDto, ReferenceHolderDto<T>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TrackerItemCommentDto

    public class ObjectCommentDto<T extends ReferenceDto>
extends AbstractCommentDto
implements ReferenceHolderDto<T>
    A comment plus a reference to the comment owner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
